title: New footage shows how the Akasha brothers were trapped by the US Government - VIDEO | The Standard
text:
Checkpoint / 16 hours ago [VIDEO] New footage shows how the Akasha brothers were trapped by the US Government 
We bring you a new footage that reveals how US secret agents laid a trap for the Akasha sons and their associates in what led to their arrest and extradition to the US to face charges. The video apparently shows how Americaâ€™s drug enforcement agency compiled a tight proof evidence of the controversial siblings engaging in the shocking drugs dealings as Related Videos
